attributes.action: Better access to services for deaf people
attributes.additional_details:
Better access to services for deaf children, young people and there families.

The deaf world is lacking better access to services (more subtitled films and films on both afternoon and evening so it's inclusive to all), better subtitles on television (that actually follow the spoken words as apose to being seconds behind, and better deaf awareness to the hearing world. People still don't understand that there are different types of deafness. Please create better deaf awareness to all and be more of an inclusive society.
